meanings.definition: To surpass in striding or walking.
meanings.sent1: She outstridden her friends in the race.
meanings.sent2: He outstridden his previous record by a mile.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise outstridden the hare in the slow and steady race.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outstridden any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The champion outstridden all competitors with ease.

meanings.definition: To outdo in striding or walking.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah outstridden all other animals in speed.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runner outstridden his opponents effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The snail outstridden the ants in a surprising turn of events.
meanings.sent4: His confidence outstridden any doubts he had about completing the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The leader outstridden the rest of the group with swift decision-making.
